Melinda Evans Front End Web Developer
Github: github.com/melindae     ●     Portfolio: www.melindacodes.com     ●     melinda@melindacodes.com

About

  • Adept at building an application from user story to final release; from wireframe, application flow, coding and testing, to pre-release QC.
  • Aggressive learner, adapts rapidly, phenomenal attention to detail, loves challenges.
  • Able to build realistic, flexible timelines to achieve the final product.

Key Skills

▪ HTML5 ▪ CSS3 ▪ JavaScript
▪ AngularJS ▪ JQuery ▪ Git
▪ Responsive Design ▪ Grunt ▪ Vector graphics
▪ Knowledge sharing ▪ Visual design ▪ Project management

Career Summary

  • Driven Learner – Attained proficiency in the tools of web development. Conceived, wrote and continue to update several applications, including one currently used live in a business for asset tracking on the fly.
  • Understands the Audience - Studied educational philosophy and the various ways people acquire and organize data and how the adult learns, seeks and processes new information. Studied graphic design and the manner that line, color, shape and texture affect the user.
  • Self-Motivating - Pursued education and training to grow from a Bench Tech to a consulting M.C.S.E. within two years.
  • Sensitive to Growth - Analyzed performance, implemented system upgrades, and integrated new technology to support a business’s rapidly growing e-commerce presence.
